short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zombie Buster is a crazy zombie shooter in which you have a bomb-gun you’re not afraid to use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Zombie Buster is a crazy zombie shooter in which you have a bomb-gun you’re not afraid to use! The zombies in this game don’t move around much, but neither do you. The only way to get these ghouls are the time-delayed bombs that shoot out of your shotgun. Aim them at a spot where they will take out lots of bad guys when they explode.

You can play directly on chrome by adding the extension and playing at the extension icon. Simple and fast
